Footer.title: RailSkyLines !
Footer.address: 01 D. Vo Van Ngan, Linh Chieu, Thu Duc, Ho Chi Minh

ourStory.title: Our Story
ourStory.content: RailSkyLines was founded with a mission to make booking train tickets fast, simple, and hassle-free. Since our inception, we have continuously improved our platform to offer a seamless, secure, and reliable ticket booking experience.

ourValues.title: Our Values
ourValues.content: We are committed to providing a transparent, convenient, and secure online train ticket booking service. RailSkyLines partners with reputable railway operators to ensure the best ticket options, making your journey smoother than ever.

ourCommitment.title: Our Commitment
ourCommitment.content: We believe that every journey is a memorable experience. RailSkyLines not only provides train tickets but also offers dedicated customer support to ensure a hassle-free travel experience from booking to boarding. Our team is always ready to assist so you can enjoy your trip with peace of mind.

dataCollection.title: Data Collection
dataCollection.content: We collect personal information you provide when creating an account, placing an order, or contacting us. This information may include your name. Additionally, we automatically collect some data when you visit our website, such as IP address and browser type.

usagePurpose.title: Purpose of Use
usagePurpose.content: We use your personal information for the following purposes:

usageList.orderProcessing: To process your order: We use your contact and payment details to confirm and process your order, as well as to send invoices and shipping information.
usageList.customerService: To provide customer service: We use your contact information to respond to inquiries, resolve issues, and provide technical support.
usageList.marketing: To send marketing information: With your consent, we may use your email address to send information about new products, services, promotions, and special events.
usageList.serviceImprovement: To improve our services: We use aggregated and anonymized data to analyze trends and enhance our services.

ErrorMessage.invalidPassword: This Password must at lest 6 character
ErrorMessage.min_6_chars: Password must be at least 6 characters
ErrorMessage.Invalid email address: Please enter a valid email address.
ErrorMessage.Password must be at least 8 characters: Password must be at least 8 characters.
ErrorMessage.Verification code must be 6 characters: Verification code must be exactly 6 characters.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: Welcome to our Terms of Service page. By using our service, you agree to comply with the following terms and conditions.

usage.title: Service Usage
usage.content: You agree to use our service only for lawful purposes and not to violate any laws. You must not distribute illegal content or violate others' privacy.

intellectualProperty.title: Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.content: All content and materials on our website, including text, images, graphics, logos, and software, are owned by us or our licensors and protected by intellectual property laws.

changes.title: Changes to Terms
changes.content: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time without prior notice. Continuing to use our service after changes means you accept them.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about these terms, please contact us via email or phone.
